column5: Well I woke up at 5:30 am and decided to go to a trib 30 mins away.  When i arrived it was zoo of fishermen. Very few steelies and tons of fishermen.  I decided to leave and go to my local river 5 mins from my house for some brownies. Had a blast with not one fisherman in sight.  Caught maybe 20 little trout and a couple over 10 inches. Most caught on the fly with bead head nymphs some others were caught with little spinners.  This is just a was a sample of one of many fish caught today.
Good stuFF!  sometimes the crowds just aint worth the hassle!
Glad to see someone actually fished trout 4 the opener
Sounds like you had a great day!
Sweet. I'd take browns on the flyrod any day over steelhead.
I'd be happy with those results, hell I'd have been happy with one. In fact I was even tossing the same lure as the one in your picture, great lure.
